title: Enhancing Leadership Practical Competencies: Genetic Foundations of Pharmacogenomics: Flipped Learning-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Students can explain individual differences in drug responses by applying genetic principles (dominant/recessive inheritance, genotype-phenotype relationships).
Students can critically approach pharmacogenomic case studies by solving pedigree analysis and genetic crossover problems.
Students can reproduce core concepts in exams with over 80% accuracy through pre-learning materials and classroom discussion activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
